items.sentence: Nobody is in the living room, but the TV is on.
I thought you were going to wear your new suit.
I took off my clothes and got into the bathtub.
I try to avoid going into the woods after dark.
I understand French better than I can speak it.
If you need to blame someone, blame Tom and me.
Is there any chance you could help me get them?
Tom likes photography, cooking and video games.
Tom often drives slightly over the speed limit.
Tom often leaves everything to the last minute.
